remarks: Inference conjoining and disjoining the antecedents of three implications.  (Contributed by Jeff Hankins, 15-Aug-2009.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 13-May-2011.)
statement:
3jaao.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps -> ch ) ) $.
3jaao.2 $e |- ( th -> ( ta -> ch ) ) $.
3jaao.3 $e |- ( et -> ( ze -> ch ) ) $.
3jaao $p |- ( ( ph /\ th /\ et ) -> ( ( ps \/ ta \/ ze ) -> ch ) ) $.
